name: BreakOutToLearn
description: This is an exercise based on the book UNITY: Learn to develop video games by Carlos I. López and that has helped me to exercise C# code in Unity, in a structured way, from start to finish and narrated in a friendly way. It has been like having instructions and the plans of a model, easy to understand and useful for those who are not initiated in this world. I make it available, in order to continue learning and considering it as a first step to future extensions. Thanks.
